javascript.shortDescription: High-level, interpreted language mainly for web development.
longDescription: JavaScript is the lingua franca of the web, powering interactive pages in browsers.
It supports event-driven, functional, and imperative styles, and has vast ecosystems (Node.js, frameworks).

python.shortDescription: Versatile language popular in data science and scripting.
longDescription: Python emphasizes readability with clear syntax and dynamic typing.
